body:
I think cloning networks would be prohibitively expensive. Is having a loop over parameters really such a bit problem? You can always implement a helper function:

```python
def set_requires_grad(module, val):
    for p in module.parameters():
        p.requires_grad = val

out1 = net(in1)
set_requires_grad(net, False)
out2 = net(in2)
set_requires_grad(net, True)
fn(out1, out2).backward()
```
